price: 39. Mpe tobetelaki bato banso ndakisa, mpe bango banso tolimwisaki bango na lolenge ya makasi.
arabic: وَكُلّٗا ضَرَبۡنَا لَهُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَۖ وَكُلّٗا تَبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wakullan ḍarabnā lahu al-amthāla wakullan tabbarnā tatbīran
